flawed_nl_solution:
Jules has to earn $2000 because 1000 / 5 = <<1000/5=2000>>2000
He has earned $40 from starting the walks because 20 x 2 = <<20*2=40>>40
He has to earn $1960 from distance, because 2000 - 40 = <<2000-40=1960>>1960
He has to walk 1568 blocks because 1960 / 1.25 = <<1960/1.25=1568>>1568
#### 1568

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
